resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Business Systems Analyst with 18 years’ experience in a GMP environment with roles in Business Systems, Leadership, Start-Up and Production. Extensive experience supporting data management and functionality for business systems including MES, BAHR, ERP, and ESB. Interact effectively with cross-functional groups possessing varying levels of system knowledge and foster effective interdepartmental and cross-functional partnerships. Possess analytical skills to understand data requirements
